# TrackerDashboard

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Credit belongs to [Hadley Wickham](https://github.com/hadley/cran-downloads), the creator of the original CRAN package download shiny application. This is my own version of his project using the `bs4Dash` package and possibly including Python data.

## Installation

Install TrackerDashboard from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("YangWu1227/tracker_dashboard")
```
